channel.title: Sprite position
channel.description:
I was trying to add some new sprites to magic spell book and i don't know the id for the spell...
[code]else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("MAGICON2") && i
== 1)[/code]
Now the icon is set on snare spell, which number is for varrock teleport spell? and how can i find out?

== 1)[/code]
